chunks.zh: 大家有收藏充电头的爱好吗？
chunks.en: Does anyone have a hobby of collecting charging heads?

chunks.zh: RT ，大家最近两年在这花了多少钱？
chunks.en: RT, how much money have you spent on this in the last two years?

chunks.zh: 能不能帮我剖析一下这种癖好背后是什么心理呢
chunks.en: Can you help me analyze the psychology behind this fetish?

chunks.zh: 说白了就是那个不行了，天天鸡儿邦硬会整这些奇奇怪怪的？
chunks.en: To put it bluntly, is it because they can't perform and, being horny all the time, they start doing these weird things?

chunks.zh: 做舔狗没有正反馈，现在我都开始迷 vps 软路由 vpn 了，特别喜欢测延迟，延迟越低快感越多😅
chunks.en: There's no positive feedback from being a simp, so now I'm obsessed with VPS soft routing VPN, and I especially like measuring latency. The lower the latency, the more pleasure I get.😅

chunks.zh: @abdullahizaki 「我发现一个规律，基本上男人年纪越大越没兴趣做舔狗…舔狗爆发集中在 20 到 25 岁30 之后的男人开始买一些奇奇怪怪的东西了…在这个论坛，我看到有买渔具的，茶的，珠子的，最离谱的是有一个沉迷充电头的…」应该是这个
chunks.en: @abdullahizaki "I've noticed a pattern: generally, the older men get, the less interested they are in being simps... Simp behavior peaks between 20 and 25 years old. Men after 30 start buying weird things... On this forum, I've seen people buying fishing gear, tea, beads, and the most outrageous is someone who's addicted to charging heads..." It should be this.

chunks.zh: @MENGKE 震惊！我已经宗师级了吗。为了舒服服地晒太阳，我可以阴雨天开车去有太阳的周边城市。😄
chunks.en: @MENGKE Shocked! Have I reached the grandmaster level? To bask in the sun comfortably, I can drive to nearby cities with sunshine on rainy days. 😄

chunks.zh: 不是我的，之前存的图
chunks.en: Not mine, it's a picture I saved before.

chunks.zh: 赛博中年人 三大爱好 路由器 nas 充电头
chunks.en: Cyber middle-aged men's three hobbies: router, NAS, charging head.

chunks.zh: 光收集充电头不够吧，快充线不得备几条。现在立讯的 usb3 线，hp 拆机的雷电 4 线都有好价
chunks.en: Just collecting charging heads is not enough, you have to prepare several fast charging cables. Now Luxshare's USB3 cables and HP's disassembled Thunderbolt 4 cables have good prices.

chunks.zh: 其实大大小小的充电头并不是收藏吧，楼上说收藏了 4 个 5V1A 的那估计才算得上收藏
chunks.en: Actually, collecting various sizes of charging heads isn't really collecting, I guess the above person that collected 4 5V1A can be considered collecting.

chunks.zh: 喜欢买大大小小的充电头只不过是买充电头的标准从「必需」降低到了「新出的充电头解决了一个痒点」例如某些人不想带着板砖大小的笔记本充电器，就去买了个氮化镓。
chunks.en: The reason people like to buy charging heads of all sizes is simply that the standard for buying charging heads has changed from "necessary" to "the newly released charging head solves a pain point." For example, some people don't want to carry a brick-sized laptop charger, so they buy a gallium nitride charger.

chunks.zh: 例如我觉得 USB 出线方向与 220V 插头平行的充电头插在墙上容易掉，以及出去玩设备太多不想带多个充电头，我就买了个多口的饼干
chunks.en: For example, I think charging heads with USB output direction parallel to the 220V plug are easy to fall off when plugged into the wall, and I don't want to bring multiple charging heads when I go out with too many devices, so I bought a multi-port charger.

chunks.zh: 以及我不想带着充电器到处跑，所以我在电脑旁、床边、公司各放了一个，自然就需要多买一两个小型的
chunks.en: And I don't want to carry a charger everywhere, so I put one next to my computer, bedside, and office, so naturally I need to buy one or two more small ones.

chunks.zh: 果然中年男人都有爱好
chunks.en: Sure enough, middle-aged men all have hobbies.

chunks.zh: 把图发出来；让我等观摩观摩吧，真是头一次听
chunks.en: Post the pictures; let us observe, this is the first time I've heard of it.

chunks.zh: 我没有收集充电头的兴趣，好奇你们有这么多需要快充的设备吗？真正需要快充的一个手机一个电脑如果不是年年换的话基本都是绑定的。
chunks.en: I don't have an interest in collecting charging heads. I'm curious, do you have so many devices that need fast charging? If you don't change your phone and computer every year, they are basically bound to fast charging.

chunks.zh: 不过我有个差不多的爱好，就是收集 USB 多口充，因为有很多电子设备，都是 USB 供电的，功率都不大（耳机、手环、万能遥控器、空气检测....）我从五口的 USB 充电器，升级到了 12 口 USB 输出。
chunks.en: However, I have a similar hobby, which is collecting USB multi-port chargers, because there are many electronic devices that are USB powered, and the power is not high (headphones, bracelets, universal remote control, air detection....). I upgraded from a five-port USB charger to a 12-port USB output.

chunks.zh: 还把 type-c 线也从单条的升级成了一转三（不知道有没有一转五）
chunks.en: I also upgraded the type-c cable from a single one to one-to-three (I don't know if there is one-to-five)

chunks.zh: 中年三大爱：路由 nas 充电头
chunks.en: Three great loves of middle age: router, NAS, charging head.

chunks.zh: 倍思的氮化镓 确实精致... 每个新品我基本都买..
chunks.en: Baseus' gallium nitride is really exquisite... I basically buy every new product.

chunks.zh: 我喜欢收集笔记本，对就是那几块钱一个能写字的那种。
chunks.en: I like to collect notebooks, yes, those that cost a few dollars each and can be written on.

chunks.zh: 每次去超市看到不一样的就买，加上平时公司发的，客户送的，现在家里一大柜子了。
chunks.en: Every time I go to the supermarket, I buy different ones, plus the ones issued by the company and given by customers, and now there is a large cabinet at home.

chunks.zh: 也送出去了好多。感觉每本都有不同地方，就是想收集
chunks.en: I've also given away a lot. I feel that each book has a different place, so I just want to collect them.

chunks.zh: @Sosocould 对于能用的人来说稳定流畅就行，但对于中年男人来说参数指标就是一种癖好😵😵
chunks.en: @Sosocould For people who just use them, stability and smoothness are enough, but for middle-aged men, parameter indicators are a kind of fetish.😵😵

chunks.zh: 中年男人三大爱好：NAS 、软路由、充电头
chunks.en: Middle-aged men's three hobbies: NAS, soft router, charging head.

chunks.zh: 有没有喜欢收藏各种手串的?我这些年收集了绿松石，南红玛瑙，貔貅，金麒麟，崖柏，沉香，砗磲等等，花了几万块吧。
chunks.en: Does anyone like to collect various bracelets? Over the years, I have collected turquoise, Southern Red Agate, Pixiu, golden Kirin, cliff cypress, agarwood, giant clam, etc., and spent tens of thousands of dollars.

chunks.zh: 小时候集过各种卡片吗？
chunks.en: Did you collect various cards when you were a kid?

chunks.zh: 买来用倒是会，收藏不会。
chunks.en: I would buy them to use, but not to collect.
